basics.name: Rumi Allbert
basics.label: AI Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced AI Engineer and Data Scientist with a strong background in machine learning, natural language processing, and data analytics. My interdisciplinary interests extend to classics, philosophy, and music.

work.name: Wolfram Institute
work.summary: Researching Minds, Machines & Intelligence, focusing on Deep Learning/Artificial Intelligence Conceptual Spaces, AI Philosophy, and Consciousness Science.
highlights: Exploring ethical, moral, and societal implications of AI development
Investigating machine ethics, AI bias, and explainability of AI decisions
Contributing to the development of ethical frameworks for responsible AI creation and deployment
responsibilities: Conducting interdisciplinary research on AI philosophy and consciousness science
Collaborating with fellow researchers on projects related to machine intelligence and cognitive functions
Utilizing Mathematica and various machine learning and AI libraries for advanced computational analysis

publications.title: Identifying and Manipulating Personality Traits in LLMs Through Activation Engineering
publications.abstract: We introduce Abliterator, a framework for studying and manipulating personality traits in large language models (LLMs) through activation engineering.

projects.name: Etymon.ai
projects.description: 🔍 An elegant, interactive web application for etymological analysis that deconstructs words into their constituent morphological components.
highlights: 🏺 Implemented comprehensive etymological analysis algorithms optimized for Classical language morphology and semantic evolution
🌳 Engineered visualization architecture using React Flow and Next.js for intuitive representation of linguistic relationships
🧠 Fine-tuned Google's Gemini AI model specifically for etymology breakdown, significantly enhancing accuracy in morphological analysis

projects.name: LLM Abliterator
projects.description: 🔬 A open-source framework for precise manipulation of personality traits in Large Language Models (LLMs) through advanced activation engineering techniques.
highlights: 🔍 Engineered a novel methodology to identify and manipulate personality-related activation vectors in neural networks
⚡ Architected a system for dynamic fine-tuning of LLM personality parameters with minimal computational overhead
🤔 Conducted rigorous analysis of ethical implications and enhanced model interpretability through systematic experimentation

projects.name: Ancient Greek Resources
projects.description: 📚 A comprehensive digital repository aggregating scholarly resources for Classical Greek language acquisition, utilized by academic institutions and researchers internationally.
highlights: 🏛️ Developed and maintained an extensive collection of pedagogical materials, including annotated textual resources, grammatical references, and lexicographical tools
🧠 Designed specialized spaced-repetition learning systems to optimize retention of complex morphological patterns
🔄 Implemented systematic content management protocols to ensure currency and academic rigor of all educational resources

projects.name: Go AI Bot
projects.description: 🤖 An enterprise-grade conversational AI system leveraging natural language processing and computational knowledge engines to deliver precise information retrieval capabilities.
highlights: 💬 Architected seamless integration with Slack API utilizing Go's concurrency model for optimal performance in high-volume messaging environments
🧠 Implemented sophisticated intent recognition and entity extraction using Wit.ai's machine learning framework
🔍 Engineered robust query processing pipeline leveraging Wolfram Alpha's computational knowledge engine for accurate information retrieval
